Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 71st overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1972...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Texas on 7/21/1976 (Going to CHC: 2B S. Braun. Going to TEX: C B. Pocoroba, RF M. Bradley)...
Injured on 6/8/1978 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 6-7 weeks...
Injured on 7/31/1978 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/19/1979, off Steve J. Kline (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/23/1979, off Mark Lemongello (DET)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1981, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1982, hitting .478 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
